attributes.action: Intervene to change the London 2012 Olympic Logo unveiled today 4th June to one which represents the London 2012 games.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The London 2012 Logo unveiled today 4th June is just awful. What is the connection/representation to the London 2012 games. 
If this was not the logo designed to represent London 2012 for the next five years it would almost be funny. Where is the London connection (other than the word London) and the Olympic colours?
Lets petition to get the government to apply pressure to have the logo changed. After it the 'peoples games' with a logo mostly hated by the people!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
